prog: (ARIBAS): function a049106(a,b: integer); var n,k,j,p,r,d: integer; s: string; begin for n := a to b do s := itoa(n); k := 0; p := 1; for j := 0 to length(s) - 1 do d := atoi(s[j..j]); k : = k + d; p := p*d; end; r := p*k; if r > 0 then if n mod r = 0 then write(n div r,","); end; end; end; end; a049106(0,1220000).
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
